name: Pandora Charts
description: Designed Pandora's first independent charts website and optimized the internal chart curation experience. Completed this project during my summer 2021 internship.
descriptionShort: Designing Pandora's charts website and optimizing its internal chart curation experience

name: Exceed
description: Designed an on-the-go solution for professionals to continue learning skills. Winner in a design case competition hosted by Paravane Ventures.
descriptionShort: Enabling professionals to continue learning skills on the go

name: Resell
description: Designed an app to facilitate thrifting and selling on Cornell's campus. Worked with engineers to get from research to beta testing in two semesters.
descriptionShort: Facilitating thrifting and selling on Cornell's campus

name: Snap Cliques
description: Prototyped a feature that increases personalization and social interaction in Snapchat’s Discover page
descriptionShort: Increasing personalization and social interaction in Snapchat’s Discover page
